item.title: Manager Weekly Newsletter
item.description: This blog-post was originally posted in SoundCloud’s blog. The original article can be found there under the name: Leveraging a Manager Weekly Newsletter for Team Communication. Below is the replicated article I started my journey as an Engineering Manager at SoundCloud close to a year ago. This came after working as a Software Engineer for more than a decade, most of which I spent as an iOS Engineer. Since then, Iâ€™ve been trying to figure out my role and expand my knowledge on the subject.
